trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding" /> class maps Microsoft Message Queuing (MSMQ) messages to Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) messages.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding" /> 类，将 Microsoft 消息队列 (MSMQ) 消息映射到 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 消息。

trans-unit.source: This binding can be used to enable WCF applications to send and receive messages to and from existing MSMQ applications that use COM, native C++ APIs or the types defined in the <xref:System.Messaging> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此绑定使 WCF 应用程序能够发送和接收到的消息和从现有 MSMQ 应用程序使用 COM、 本机 c + + Api 或类型定义中<xref:System.Messaging>命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The following configuration file snippet illustrates how to configure the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding> binding on the client:
trans-unit.target: 下面的配置文件片段演示如何在客户端上配置 <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding> 绑定：

trans-unit.target: 下面的配置文件片段演示如何在服务上配置 <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding> 绑定：

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何以编程方式在服务上使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding> 绑定：

trans-unit.source: The following code illustrates how to use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding> binding on the client programmatically:
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何以编程方式在客户端上使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding> 绑定：

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The security mode supported by the Message Queuing (MSMQ) integration channel
trans-unit.target: 消息队列 (MSMQ) 集成通道支持的安全模式

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding" /> class by using the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to instantiate a new instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding> and pass in a security mode.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此方法来实例化 <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding> 的新实例，并传入安全模式。

trans-unit.source: The following code illustrates how to instantiate an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding> binding, specifying the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode>:
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何实例化 <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding> 绑定的实例，同时指定 <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode>：

trans-unit.source: The value is not within the range of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 值不在 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode" /> 值的范围内。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see langword="configurationName" /> attribute that identifies the <see langword="binding" /> element whose settings are used to initialize the binding.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="configurationName" /> 属性的值，该值标识其设置用于初始化绑定的 <see langword="binding" /> 元素。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding" /> class from the settings of a specified configuration binding element.
trans-unit.target: 从指定配置绑定元素的设置中初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This method allows you to place the binding settings in a configuration file but add the actual binding in code.
trans-unit.target: 利用此方法，你可以将绑定设置放在配置文件中，但将实际绑定添加在代码中。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to create an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding> binding and initialize it by passing in the name of the binding element:
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何通过传入绑定元素的名称来创建 <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding> 绑定的实例并初始化该实例：

trans-unit.source: Returns the binding elements in the basic profile stack.
trans-unit.target: 返回基本配置文件堆栈中的绑定元素。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection" /> that contains the stack of binding elements in the basic profile stack.
trans-unit.target: 包含基本配置文件堆栈中的绑定元素堆栈的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurity" /> that is associated with this binding.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此绑定相关联的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurity" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurity" /> that is associated with this binding.
trans-unit.target: 与此绑定相关联的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurity" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurity> encapsulates Message Queuing (MSMQ) transport security settings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurity> 封装消息队列 (MSMQ) 传输安全设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the serialization format to be used to serialize or deserialize the message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要用于序列化或反序列化消息的序列化格式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat" /> object that represents the type of serialization to use.
trans-unit.target: 表示要使用的序列化类型的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This property returns an enumeration value that specifies how a WCF message will be serialized and deserialized.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回一个枚举值，指定 WCF 消息将序列化和反序列化方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat>。

trans-unit.source: The following code illustrates how to set the serialization format on an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding> class:
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何在 <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding> 类的实例上设置序列化格式：

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether security information should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指定是否应序列化安全信息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if security information should be serialized; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应对安全信息进行序列化，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。
